decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Sheet 3 of 5 Rev 2, Sheet 1 of 4 Rev 2, Sheet 2 of 4 Rev 2, Sheet 4 of 4 Rev 2 and location plan. Received: 17th September 2015. Sheet 3 of 4 Rev 4. Received: 9th November 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The development hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the property known as 6A Standard Road, Hounslow, it shall not be used as a separate unit of residential accommodation.
Condition : 6 - The development shall not be occupied until the existing crossover to the garage is closed and the kerb re-instated.
description: Conversion of garage into habitable room incorporating alterations to roof height and elevational changes to the front garage.
